animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I'm known for my love of a certain nut.
🐘 I'm the largest land animal.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I meow and love to chase mice. I also like to drink milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 I have whiskers and soft fur.
🍶 I often purr when happy.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I enjoy chewing on bones.
🐕 I'm often called 'man's best friend'.
🎾 I like to chase after balls.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I enjoy munching on orange vegetables.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🌱 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. I waddle when I walk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat plants and bugs in the water.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌧️ My feathers are waterproof.

animal.question: I roar and live in the jungle. I am known as the king. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🦁 I am a very strong cat.
☀️ I often sleep during the day.

animal.question: I am green and jump very high. I like to eat flies. Who am I?

hints.text: 👅 I have a long, sticky tongue.
🐸 I start as a tadpole.
💧 I like to live near water.

animal.question: I live in the sea and have eight arms. I can squeeze into small places. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
🌊 I can change color to hide.
🧠 I'm a very smart sea creature.

animal.question: I am black and white and eat bamboo. I live in China. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat a lot of one particular plant.
🐼 I am a type of bear.
🇨🇳 My natural habitat is in Asia.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and have no legs. Some of us are venomous. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin as I grow.
🥚 I hatch from eggs.
🐭 I like to eat rodents.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I keep us warm.
💛 I'm a star in our solar system.
🔥 You shouldn't look directly at me!

cosmos.question: I am round and go around the Sun. You live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have trees and oceans.
🌎 I am the third planet from the sun.
👣 People walk all over me.

cosmos.question: I am in the sky at night. Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like when I'm full.
🌕 I reflect light from the sun.
🧀 People think I'm made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I'm a ball of fire far away, I twinkle at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I look small but I'm very big.
✨ I am made of hot gas.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am red, and named after a Roman god of war. What planet am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me.
🔴 I'm called the Red Planet.
🤖 Rovers explore me.

cosmos.question: I am very big and made of gas, with a famous red spot. What planet am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I am the biggest planet in our solar system.
🌪️ My red spot is a giant storm.
🌀 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I called?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 Major is one
🌌 I can show you the zodiac signs.
🌠 People used me to navigate the seas.

cosmos.question: I am a very hot ball of gas held together by gravity, and I produce light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 Our Sun is one.
🔥 I can be many different colors.
⚛️ Nuclear fusion happens inside me.

cosmos.question: I'm a rocky object orbiting the Sun, but I'm too small to be a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be found in a belt.
🌑 Some think I killed the dinosaurs.
💥 I can cause a crater if I hit a planet.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I have a cool, milky name.
🌌 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🔭 Scientists study me from far away.
